summary:
The Security Council,

Reaffirming previous resolutions on the issue, 
Endorsing the work of the Committee established pursuant to resolution 1540 (2004),

Noting postponement of comprehensive review due to COVID-19,

Acting under Chapter VII of the Charter,

1. Decides to extend until 28 February 2022 the mandate of the 1540 Committee with the continued assistance of its group of experts;
2. Requests the 1540 Committee to continue and complete the comprehensive review on the status of implementation of resolution 1540 (2004) and submit a report;
3. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
